      • getAuthenticatedConnectionOrThrow

        protected final XMPPConnection getAuthenticatedConnectionOrThrow()
                                                          throws SmackException.NotLoggedInException
        Get the XMPPConnection of this Manager if it's authenticated, i.e. logged in. Otherwise throw a SmackException.NotLoggedInException.
        Returns:
        the XMPPConnection of this Manager.
        Throws:
        SmackException.NotLoggedInException - if the connection is not authenticated.
